# Templates

Working templates for the SpiralSafe protocol files.

## Contents

- **[bump.md](bump.md)** - Template for BUMP protocol files (build/task instructions)
- **[wave.md](wave.md)** - Template for cascading issues analysis

## Protocol Specifications

For the authoritative protocol specifications, see:
- `/protocol/bump-spec.md` - BUMP protocol specification
- `/protocol/wave-spec.md` - WAVE protocol specification
- `/protocol/context-yaml-spec.md` - Context YAML specification

## Usage

These templates provide starting points for creating protocol-compliant documents:

1. **bump.md** - Copy this template when creating build instructions or task specifications for agents
2. **wave.md** - Use this framework when conducting cascading issue analysis

## Note

These are working templates, not authoritative specifications. Always refer to the spec files in `/protocol/` for the canonical definitions of these protocols.
